original_text: But in all Israel there was none to be so much praised as Absalom for his beauty: from the sole of his foot even to the crown of his head there was no blemish in him.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘 가운데에서 압살롬 같이 아름다움으로 크게 칭찬 받는 자가 없었으니 그는 발바닥부터 정수리까지 흠이 없음이라

sentences.original_text: But in all Israel there was none
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 온 이스라엘 중에는 아무도 없었으니

sentences.original_text: to be so much praised as Absalom
from the sole of his foot
even to the crown of his head
there was no blemish in him
